Name: Sahl Yaseen
BioText:
Sahl Ibn Zin Yasin is an excellent Imam and a master of tilawat of the Qurâ€™an and Tajweed who is of Saudi Arabian nativity. He is a personality to reckon with the amazing quality of his psalmody which has mesmerized the Muslim Ummah no end.

Presently, Shaykh Sahl is conducting Imamat at the renowned Masjid Al Amir Sultan Mosque, Jeddah.
